title: How to start learning Javascript?
content: Before learning JavaScript, you must know how to code with Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). That's because these two tools are fundamental to web development. HTML provides the basic framework for websites, and CSS adds styling elements, like font color, size, and layout. After doing so, you can enroll in any free course/ paid course to start learning Javascript. The best way to learn is to learn by creating projects! As they will help you in Future projects with Javascript
metadesc: Before learning JavaScript, you must know how to code with Hypertext Markup Language (HTML)
